title: Audit Records Management Policy
description: An auditor reviews compliance with the company's records management policy, focusing on the storage of physical records.

tasks.description: Perform an inspection of the on-site records storage room.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor inspects the physical storage area.

tasks.description: Observe that the room is unlocked and boxes are not labeled according to the policy's classification scheme.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor identifies several policy violations related to physical security and labeling.

tasks.description: Recommend that a log be kept for access to the records room and that all boxes be properly labeled.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specific recommendations are made to improve the records management process.
